DIY natural perfumes: Using essential oils, herbs, and spices, you can create your own natural perfumes that are not only pleasant but also healthy. For example, you can mix lavender and peppermint essential oils with a carrier oil to make a refreshing and calming scent.
DIY candle scents: You can create your own candle scents by mixing essential oils with beeswax or soy wax. You can also add dried flowers or herbs to the candle to give it a unique scent.

Homemade air fresheners: You can make your own air fresheners by using baking soda, vinegar, and essential oils. Simply mix the baking soda and vinegar together and add a few drops of your favorite essential oil to create a fresh and clean scent.

Natural flower arrangements: You can create beautiful flower arrangements that not only look beautiful but also release a pleasant scent. You can use flowers like lavender, jasmine, and rosemary to create a calming and relaxing atmosphere.

Use of essential oils in cooking: Essential oils like lemon, peppermint, and rosemary can be used in cooking to add flavor and aroma to your dishes. You can use them in marinades, dressings, and sauces to create a pleasant scent in your kitchen.
